mapper.select:
select eventTitle, eventContent, eventStartDate, eventEndDate, eventMainImg, eventSubImg from ( select row_number() over(order by event_inputdate desc) num, event_num eventNum, event_title eventTitle, event_content eventContent, to_char(event_startdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') eventStartDate, to_char(event_enddate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') eventEndDate, event_main_img eventMainImg, EVENT_SUB_IMG eventSubImg
from event ) where num between 1 and 6
